title: Jonathan Hill – 2010 Speech to the Sixth Form Colleges Forum
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Jonathan Hill in Birmingham on 25 November 2010.
content:
The Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State for Schools talks about the impact the Government’s educational reforms will have on sixth form colleges.
